ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Abashi's response to Tinkering Timeline
ygData.msgSnippet: As seen on Caster s Realm: http://eq.castersrealm.com/viewarticle.asp?Article=1845 ******************************* SNIP ******************************* Q)...
ygData.messageBody:
As seen on Caster's Realm:

http://eq.castersrealm.com/viewarticle.asp?Article=1845

******************************* SNIP *******************************

Q)... am I incorrect in believing that Tinkering will never be made viable
or otherwise improved?


Abashi's answer: [As for tinkering] this is the same thing as #2. We'd
like to improve all of the trade skills at some point, but it's hard to
say when it will make it on to our current project list. However, I can
say that this issue has been spoken about recently here in the office and
is probably closer to being made a current project than many things.

******************************* SNIP *******************************

In other words, fellow tinkerers, don't hold your breath. <sigh> I'm
predicting that Tinkering will see it's upgrade during the same week of
the much anticipated Diablo 8, Ultima Online 5 and Verant's brand new
Smurf's Online <puke>. However, I fear I'll never be able to enjoy the
upgrade as by that time, my grandson will be spreading my ashes over the
surface of Saturn.

QdP
Gnomish Magi
Ilsik Haucil
Mith Marr

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"
